title: SocialStream
description: Created a full-stack social media and video-sharing platform using the MERN stack, integrating features of Twitter and YouTube.

title: Travel app
description: Developed a fully functional travel webapp using ReactJS, Redux, and Firebase to simulate a real-world travel website.

title: Ecommerce Website
description: Developed a fully functional e-commerce website clone using ReactJS, Redux, and Firebase to simulate a real-world online store.

title: User Management System
description: Built a User Management System using the MERN stack with JWT authentication, Redux, Axios, lazy loading, and Tailwind CSS,

title: Weather Forcasting App
description: Created a weather forecasting application using ReactJS and OpenWeatherMap API to provide real-time weather data.
